name: Pray for Prey
description:
Made for LudumDare50 : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/pray-for-prey in collaboration with https://github.com/Goncalo-Chambel

Mating season is here! And you are a mantis full of sigma male energy! You spot a female, shes’ so prayin’ mantilicious.

However she’s playing hard to get. After all as they say, nothing great ever came that easy.

Anyway, your objective is to seduce the lady mantis either by collecting food, or performing cool mating dances for her, chicks dig that (we think) . The little branch at the top represents your progress, and be careful, if you take too long a certain someone will be mad at you.

Screenshots

Controls

  • W,A,S,D or arrows
  • P - pray
  • E - advance dialog
  • Space - skip dialog
  • R - Restart
  • Escape - Pause Menu
  • Q - Quit

Cool Facts About Praying Mantises (or whatever the plural is)

  • They only eat meat (no grass or anything like that)
  • They are good to have in your garden as they make other insects bite the dust
  • They are green
  • They can turn their head like an owl
  • their front legs are supa quick

Things used:

  • Asesprite
  • Photoshop
  • Unity
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Audacity
  • Visual Studio
  • Coffee
  • Brain
